document_data.name: Cat's Eye circlet
document_data.mainbody: ese beautiful circlets were often adorned with [[cat's eye agate]]s, gems that, if enchanted, could bestow [[darkvision]].
document_data.Description: These beautiful circlets were often adorned with [[cat's eye agate]]s, gems that, if enchanted, could bestow [[darkvision]].
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Catti-brie]], who was gifted this before she went to chase [[Drizzt Do'Urden]], who headed back into the [[Underdark]] to his home city of [[Menzoberranzan]]. Her circlet was enchanted by [[Alustriel]] of [[Silverymoon]].
